Event Planning and Strategy

In this module you will be given the opportunity to apply the concepts and theory developed throughout the programme to the planning of an event, recognising the changing reality of the event environment and the challenges it presents to the event professional. You will also explore how the use of technology can enhance an event to maximise audience participation, increase revenue, cut costs and make it more personal, tangible and unforgettable.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Evaluate the strategic management theory underpinning event planning.

+  Critically evaluate the use of technology in the event planning process.

+  Develop a comprehensive and detailed event plan.

+  Demonstrate a Critical Knowledge of the Tools, Methods and Procedures Used within the Network Security Arena.

+   Analyse and apply generic evaluation theory and methods to event management and event tourism.

+   Evaluate the impact of an event on stakeholders and the wider environment.
